question: Evaluate the prevalence of medically resistant epilepsy in the hospitalized setting.
Describe the existing care for patients with traumatic brain injury and the outcomes.

Identify whether consumption of antioxidant-rich foods from the Mediterranean diet is associated with better cognitive performance in a cohort of elderly persons at high risk for coronary heart disease.
Determine whether apixaban is superior to aspirin in preventing stroke recurrence.
Explore the effects of music therapy on cognitive function in patients with Alzheimer’s disease.

Evaluate the efficacy (as measured by change in Montgomery-Åsberg Depression Rating Scale [MADRS] 24 hours after treatment) in adolescent patients with treatment-resistant major depressive disorder randomized to either intravenous ketamine or midazolam.
Identify the role of α-synuclein phosphorylated at Serine129 (pS129) in neuronal activity.
Explore the influence of exosomes derived from neural stem cells on the spinal cord microvascular regeneration after spinal cord injury.

Evaluate the susceptibility of the blood brain barrier to SARS-CoV-2 infection based on 1) evidence of interferon upregulation in the neurovascular unit in cases of fatal COVID-19 and 2) changes to transcription, paracellular tightness, and viral replication and transport in a cultured cell model of neurovascular endothelium.
